segments.text: This scene makes me worry about the family.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so unaware of the water flooding the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin the floor and cabinets if it keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is wet, and she might slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are taking a big risk too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the tilting stool could tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks excited, but I feel bad for them if they get caught or hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is serene, a stark contrast to this indoor trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch potential accidents unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They all seem happy in their own ways, but danger lurks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Maybe it'll all turn out fine, but I doubt it.
segments.speaker: PAR
